## Extension.isEnabled() method

Determines whether this extension is enabled. If a command name is provided then it should return a value determining whether that command is able to be run.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
isEnabled?(params: ExtensionManagerParams): CommandStatusCheck<string>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  params | <code>ExtensionManagerParams</code> | extension manager parameters |

<b>Returns:</b>

`CommandStatusCheck<string>`
